title: EU law targets Big Tech over hate speech, disinformation - Economic Times
content:
1. EU law targets Big Tech over hate speech, disinformation  Economic Times
  2. Europe agrees to sweeping new regulations for tech platforms  CNN
  3. EU law targets big tech companies over hate speech, disinformation  The Financial Express
  4. Tech giants face landmark fines for breaches under EUs new content rules  Business Standard
  5. EU approves groundbreaking rules to police Big Tech platforms  Financial Times
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: European Union officials clinched the agreement in principle on the Digital Services Act after lengthy final negotiations that began Friday. The law will also force tech companies to make it easier for users to flag problems, ban online ads aimed at kids and empower regulators to punish noncompliance with billions in fines.
